entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QuickGrid API docs missing #52466
  • Flaky test ClientAbortingConnectionImmediatelyIsNotLoggedHigherThanDebug #52464
  • QuickGrid in Blazor Server .Net 8 Not available #52463
  • Flaky test BidirectionalStream_ServerReadsDataAndCompletes_GracefullyClosed #52462
  • StaticWebAssets.Publish.targets -The process cannot access the file o net8.0-android #52460
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52459
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #52458
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #52457
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, single_query #52456
  • Adding server side blazor breaks hot reloading of regular razor pages #52453
    Backlog
  • Stop aspnetcore application running in IIS #52451
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52448
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52447
  • [.NET 9.0] Native Trace Instrumentation Support for ASP.NET Core as per OTel specification #52439
  • `InvalidOperationException` occurs on `onsubmit` event when using `NavigateTo` method with non-ASCII characters on Blazor SSR render mode. #52438
  • General feedback on kestrel connection metrics #52437

Closed

  • [gRPC] How to correctly transmit error details to client with gRPC-JSON transcoding? #49196
  • IncludeHttpRuleProtos not working if not reference Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.JsonTranscoding directly #52006
  • Cannot deserialize into `google.protobuf.NullValue` in gRPC JSON transcoding #51521
  • IDX40001: Issuer: 'https://xxxxx.b2clogin.com/<TenantId>/v2.0/', does not match any of the valid issuers provided for this application #52283
  • Clarify Blazor Web Route behavior #52176
  • dotnet 7.0 and dotnet 8.0 are incompatible (host part) #52352
  • chunkingcookiemanager leaks unused chunks #4639
    9.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #52446
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #52444
  • Perf regression: json, json #52445
  • False warning for attribute routes when using route tokens #52427
  • Expand event handling to BOM events #12798
    Planning: WebUI
  • Inheriting from InputText and adding "type" attribute results in nothing rendered #52450
  • My project whichi is working correctlly in visualstudio2022 v17.6 does not work after updating vs to v17.8 #52346
  • Blazor Server does not work after upgrade to .NET 8.0 #52095
  • Cannot render component from RazorClassLibrary with RenderMode.InteractiveWebAssembly or Auto in Blazor 8 #52037
  • .NET8 Not respecting @layout #52367
    Discussions
  • Blazor SSR rendering on navigation with JS interop/styling #52179
  • Blazor SSR error when rendermode is InteractiveWebAssembly #51749
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52418
  • Unable to call StaticWebAssetsLoader.UseStaticWebAssets after upgrading to VS 2022 official release #38212
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 8.0.x
  • Fix generating enum schema in gRPC JSON transcoding OpenAPI #52449
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Respect "grpc-status-details-bin" trailer on error response #51394
    area-grpc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix auto import of proto files when gRPC JSON transcoding is a transitive reference #52443
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix reading null struct property value in gRPC JSON transcoding #52442
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview1
  • gRPC JSON transcoding — Fixed parsing string values into enum when provided string is not valid enum value #52402
    area-grpc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Delete Stale Chunks #52272
    area-auth, 9.0-preview1
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates #52428
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    area-infrastructure
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HTTP Gone (410) result #52377
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, area-networking
